title: File Freight Claim for Damage
description: A shipment was delivered with visible damage. A claims specialist must file a claim with the carrier.

tasks.description: Retrieve the shipment record and the signed Proof of Delivery (POD) where the damage was noted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary shipment details and POD document.

tasks.description: Collect documentation of the damage, including photos and a commercial invoice for the value of the goods.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all required supporting documents.

tasks.description: Submit the claim to the carrier through their claims portal, attaching all documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the claim and receives a claim number from the carrier.
